101711100.evoFlair_: Those who believe in heavenly miracles shall be spared. Those who pray with all their hearts shall surely drive back the darkness!

102711030.baseEffect_: Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.

102711030.evoEffect_: Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
102711030.evoFlair_: A radiant fox that illuminates the darkest nights. Beneath its beautiful fur lies bestial ferocity.

103711060.evoFlair_: Don't you think it's wonderful to be loved by animals? I mean, all my animal friends are so adorable!

104711020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to an ally.

104711040.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to this follower.

104711040.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to this follower.
104711040.evoFlair_: I have two arms! These things on my face are actually a beard!

105711010.baseFlair_: I'm still not much of a bird person. Birds move so fast and always try to fly away. I'll do my job, but, well, you know.
105711010.evoFlair_: Eeek, it's flying this way! Or at least I thought it was. Maybe it saw my wings and thought I was another bird. I wish they'd just stay nice and calm.

106711020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw X cards. X equals the number of allied amulets in play.

106711020.evoFlair_: For every wish, the stars shine. I weave my own wishes so that the world will shine more.

107711020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.

107711020.evoFlair_: My mighty wings shall take to the earth. The wretched, wingless mortals shall find no refuge in this heavenly paradise.

111711020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if this follower didn't attack this turn, destroy all enemy followers with 2 defense or less.
111711020.baseFlair_: I pray for guidance as I venture into the deepest slumber. Yet the world remains replete with the unlearned who reject holy repose. Very well... They shall lie with the others one way or another.
111711020.evoFlair_: Under the shadow of doctrine, sink into the deepest of slumbers. Where repose is supreme, branded are the deranged who reject it. And it is the deranged who shall be disposed of, for sempiternity.

116711020.baseFlair_:
Guide the lost. Spread your wings. Let your pride soar high upon the wind. Look often on the banner you carry, for it will direct you on your sacred quest.

116711020.evoFlair_:
People are inherently good. By nature, we are virtuous. Corruption is wrought by the hands of others. Actors have arrived, seeking to warp our innate characters. If you wish for peace, pray to be returned unto your natural state.

117711010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If another allied follower with Ward is in play, destroy an enemy follower. Otherwise, gain Ward.

117711010.evoFlair_: As a servant of the gods, she is called on to impart their wisdom unto mankind. The edicts are observed; the lost are guided onto the path of faith. And thus, holy salvation is delivered, efficiently and righteously.

900711020.baseFlair_: A fiery tiger guided by a holy light. Its incandescent flames consume their victims, leaving not a scrap of flesh on the bone.
900711020.evoFlair_: A tiger ablaze with pure, incandescent flames that illuminate and purify even the deepest darkness. It is said that the tiger's flames burn to guide the departed to heaven.

900711080.baseEffect_:
Ward.

900711080.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Summon a Hare of Illusions.
900711080.evoFlair_: I am a phantom, an illusion. I can become more than that if you so wish, however.

900711100.baseFlair_: When the bejeweled stone gleams in seven hues, an ancient guardian will be awakened to wreak havoc upon the wicked.
900711100.evoFlair_: The bejeweled stone leads the way to purity—allies of darkness and the wicked placed before the stone will be exorcised from within.

100721020.baseFlair_: Your evil deeds end here. You have defied God himself and there is no place to hide! I see your true form!
100721020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Banish an enemy follower with 3 defense or less.
100721020.evoFlair_: There it is! I see your weakness! My mace shall pummel it into a pulp!

101721040.baseFlair_: Welcome to the Devil's flock. Now it's time to prove your loyalty and offer your eternal soul to the master!
101721040.evoEffect_: Evolve: Subtract 2 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
101721040.evoFlair_: Heh-heh, I acknowledge your prayers of desperation. Now do as the Devil asks of you, and unleash the greed within your hearts. Soak this world in blood!

115721020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an allied follower with Ward is in play, gain Storm.

We slew the villain controlling the earth and took back our bountiful lands. I only wish our scattered countrymen had been there to see it.
—Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 6
115721020.evoFlair_: We managed to slay the villain controlling the heavens. We took back the skies. Some "heroes of hope." So many of us died. So many sacrifices. —Battles of the Holy Knights, Chapter 7

116721010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Summon a Holylight Convert.
At the start of your opponent's turn, gain +2/+0 for each allied follower with Ward in play.
116721010.baseFlair_: Which is stronger, a prayer or a sword? Pray when someone's got cold steel pressed to your throat, and you'll find the answer real quick. But, when you keep praying—every day—something happens... You embrace this thing called faith, and that can conquer any blade.
116721010.evoEffect_:
Ward.
At the start of your opponent's turn, gain +2/+0 for each allied follower with Ward in play.
116721010.evoFlair_: With faith comes light—and mettle. You know, you remind me of myself, back when I believed only in the kind of strength you can see. But let me show you something. Faith can shatter even the tempered blade, and it is dazzling.

900721010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, restore 2 defense to this follower.
900721010.baseFlair_: The white wings flutter up. Hearing a voice pray for salvation, the beast lends its power of defense.
900721010.evoFlair_: What do they pray for; what do they wish for? Before the opposing statues, the people reveal the content of their hearts, whether pure or impure. Responding to their prayers, the sacred bird swoops upward.

900721020.baseFlair_: The black wings fall down. Hearing a voice of judgment, the beast lends its power to the invasion.
900721020.evoFlair_: What do they pray for; what do they wish for? Before the opposing statues, the people reveal the content of their hearts, whether pure or impure. Responding to their prayers, the demonic bird swoops downward.

900721030.baseFlair_: Surrounded by prayers and wishes, the shield transforms to armor. Verily, thy faith is strong as iron. But is it strong as adamant, and can it pierce walls? —Chapter 6, Path to Salvation
900721030.evoFlair_: Every sorrow shall be expelled and vanquished. The armor is but one sign of many. The way to salvation continues on, and thou must walk along it. —Chapter 7, Path to Salvation

107731010.baseEffect_:
When this follower comes into play, restore 2 defense to all other allied followers.

107731010.baseFlair_: To be revered and honored didn't suit him, so he threw it away—just to remain the way he was.
107731010.evoEffect_: Last Words: Give a random allied Countdown amulet Last Words: Summon a Pegasus Dullahan.
107731010.evoFlair_: Even lauded as a hero he found himself lost, so he threw it away and found it again—a way to protect the world in the way he was.

110731010.baseFlair_: I pray for guidance as I venture into the deepest slumber. Awaken to the blazing light of morning, and you will find only suffering. We yearn for the sleep that will continue long into the future.

Bane.
At the end of your turn, if this follower didn't attack this turn, randomly destroy an enemy follower with the highest attack in play.

Do not teach your brethren to awaken, for unbroken sleep is in itself salvation.
—Teachings of the Sleepers

112731020.baseFlair_: Hallways: clear. Perimeter: clear. Ummm... Underfoot: clear. As Queen Zoe's attendant, it's my job to protect her from misfortune. I'm pleased to say it's going to be another perfect day of beating back any menace that... What? You fell into a hole? I'm on my way!
112731020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
112731020.evoFlair_: Weather: perfect. Monsters: slain. Now, Your Majesty, if you'll give me your hand. I'll make sure no evil befalls you. So long as I'm by your side... A-are those meteors falling from the sky?!

"That's not what I meant, but... Oh, dear God..." ―Conversation between Elana and Kel

110741020.evoFlair_: Only the ignorant seek that which is outside the self. Are you prepared to unravel the secrets of repose, to fade into the deepest slumber, and trample on what you may find? For this is the trial that I now present the world.

101711060.evoFlair_: We, the servants of the Heavenly Father, are the only ones who remain to help those who need us. And so we will not rest—not until this war finally ends.

102711050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
102711050.baseFlair_: My wings beat for you, O pure of heart! May the wind carry my prayers aloft!
102711050.evoFlair_: I take to the skies for the pure of heart! O mighty wind, rend my foes asunder!

108711030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to an enemy if there are at least 2 amulets in your hand.
108711030.baseFlair_: His hands became paws, and his form became monstrous. But he did not abandon god, and neither did he stop praying.
108711030.evoFlair_: To theists, he was the perfect believer. To atheists, he was the perfect maniac.

109711030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Can't attack.
When an allied amulet is destroyed during your turn, evolve this follower.

109711030.evoFlair_: Devout adherent, you believe the truth you know to be right—but can anyone prove the world you perceive to be true? Not all truths are absolute, some may even be false. —Regarding Faith, Chapter 5

112711020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the Countdown of an allied amulet.
During your turn, if an allied amulet is destroyed, evolve this follower.
112711020.baseFlair_: Do it, slack off, do it, slack off... You can decide a lot of things by picking the petals off of flowers. For example, I don't have to work very hard today.
112711020.evoFlair_: Slack off, do it, slack off, do it... Ah, what do we have here? A trespasser? Well, unfortunately for you, the flowers have decided I have to be a dedicated guardian today.

113711020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Summon an Assembly Droid.
113711020.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. Prayers to God will serve as further salvation for both people and birdfolk. Ironknuckle Nun received new arms, and he received new wings. ―Notes from a Priory, Vol. 1
113711020.evoFlair_: What's important is to save everyone you can reach. But there's nothing wrong with flying. You go quick, and the view's great! I don't know why I fly! I've just got the spirit! ―Steelwing to Ironknuckle Nun

114711010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random amulet from your deck into your hand.
114711010.baseFlair_: "My sword serves as a powerful talisman." Her soft smile is enough to convince any traveler that her impossibly large sword is nothing more than a protective charm.
114711010.evoFlair_: "My sword serves as a powerful talisman." Her delighted smile is enough to alert any demon that her impossibly large sword is meant for purging evil.

115711020.baseEffect_:

----------
When this follower comes into play, restore 3 defense to your leader.
115711020.baseFlair_: One day, our prayers will bear fruit. Only God knows what fruit that will be, or how it will taste. Prayer is the act of enduring while keeping faith in God's justice.
115711020.evoFlair_: Even should our prayers be granted in a different form than we expect, there is no cause to grieve. The time you spent in prayer has made you more just. Allow me to show you the strength which prayer and perseverance nurtures.

900711030.baseFlair_: A winged white horse that comes to the aid of those who worship blue skies.
900711030.evoFlair_: A pure white horse that comes to the aid of heroes chosen by heaven. It soars through the skies, propelled by the beats of its mighty wings.

900711040.baseFlair_: On the night when the moon is closest to our world, the goddess' guardian fox descends to the mortal realm.
900711040.evoFlair_: The tail of the elegant fox flutters in the breeze, serving as a warning to all those who seek to wrong the goddess. Those foolish enough to ignore its warning are torn to shreds in no time at all.

900711060.baseFlair_: The sound of a flute rings out across the sky, parting the clouds. From the gap this winged servant of heaven descends to the mortal realm.
900711060.evoFlair_: The regal falcon's feathers turn the soil white whenever they make contact with land, eradicating evil and hatred.

900711090.baseFlair_: The gods blessed the great bird with feathers of metal so that it would never be hunted or perish again.
900711090.evoFlair_: The gods blessed the great bird with intelligence so that it could outwit both hunters and death itself.

100721010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Subtract 1 from the Countdown of all allied amulets.
100721010.baseFlair_: Those who dwell in the human realm, heed my words: love thy neighbor, and have faith. Faith is the path that leads to all answers.
100721010.evoFlair_: A world without love is a world without light. A world filled with love is a world without darkness. To battle against the encroaching shadows, we must all love our neighbors.

101721030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Gain +4/+0 during the opponent's turn.
101721030.baseFlair_: I am a proud warrior entrusted to protect this church from harm. My duty is to eradicate evil and defend all that is holy!
101721030.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Gain +4/+0 during the opponent's turn.
101721030.evoFlair_: Enemies may amass in mighty armies, but this lance shall pierce them all! I have nothing to fear. All evil will be eradicated!

101721100.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all allied followers resistance to targeted enemy spells and effects.
101721100.baseFlair_: Prostrate yourself. Knights such as I should not have to taint ourselves by association with the likes of you.
101721100.evoFlair_: I do not wish to look at you any longer. But I'll at least cut you down in one stroke so you don't have to suffer.

102721030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Restore 3 defense to your leader.
Draw a card.

(Prepare to receive the goddess's blessed rod across your fleshy bits! This holy relic will purge you of your sins! Prostrate yourself in gratitude for the goddess's mercy, you failure!)

101721050.evoFlair_: A knight must know how to protect his charges in any situation. Those are the rules! Hm? From what am I protecting you currently? Why, is it not obvious? Sharks that swim on land and other such beasties!

103731020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
103731020.baseFlair_: Losing's the worst; I'd never ever want anyone to beat me. My heart would die the moment I admitted defeat.
103731020.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
103731020.evoFlair_: I don't believe in gods. And I don't go looking to knights in shining armor. My own power is all I need to ensure victory!

112731010.baseEffect_:
Ward.

Can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
112731010.baseFlair_: And thus I prayed: If the desires of the body should inhibit my relationship with the heavens, then I shall embrace the machine. Thank you for this opportunity to discard my sinful flesh. —Church Records, Part 3
112731010.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
112731010.evoFlair_: Since the old preacher had his body augmented, he's been praying away—like a prayer machine! All day, mind you! I hope the man upstairs answers his call soon. —Layperson's Account, Part 3

101741010.baseFlair_: God has been destroyed. There is no use in praying. Only one path to absolution remains: utter nihilism.
101741010.evoFlair_: The end is upon us. It is all part of the plan. Do not look back, children of gods. Do not resist, children of demons. There is only one path towards eternal peace: utter nihilism!

"Beat that thing up and we'll get to all the treasure inside that temple."
"Shiny stuff!"

105741020.evoFlair_:
"Be careful. We don't know what kind of beast it is."

106741020.baseFlair_: It cannot be described accurately, because it cannot be perceived with the eye. It is a terrifying beast, a fallen angel that is a shadow of its former self. Those who lay eyes upon it are destroyed, and those who speak of it go mad. —Demon Typology, Chapter 8
106741020.evoEffect_: Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - Destroy every Countdown amulet immediately after you play it. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.)
106741020.evoFlair_: Utter its name and resolve yourself to madness. Prayers and wishes are but moans and screams before it. An aberration that sits outside of reality, it is impossible for our kind to make sense of. —Demon Typology, Chapter 12

Ward.
At the start of the opponent's turn, until the start of your next turn, gain +4/+0.
107741020.evoFlair_: This brilliance of my arms is the insignia of supreme judgment—for great justice! Wickedness and allies of evil, your hour of reckoning has finally come, for divine judgment cannot be escaped!

Ward.

108741010.evoFlair_: The mirror-blades shine on enmity and dispel malice with their light. So long as I'm here, you will not be harmed. Here I go! Deploy, mirror-blades!

111741020.evoFlair_: The holy god returned him to life, whereupon he rose wreathed in holy light. As joyous cries echoed across the battlefield, malevolent spirits cowered in fear. —Chapter 19, Notes from the Battlefield

114741030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. Recover X play points. X equals the number of allied amulets that have been destroyed this match.
114741030.baseFlair_: The ruddy censer of Erythron soothes the pure of heart with a gentle flame while the azure mace Kyanos quenches evil with cutting ice. When enough terrestrial mass fills both vessels, the ground will be split between red and blue.
114741030.evoFlair_: Stoked by prayer, the ruddy censer of Erythron harbors a restorative flame, while anger fuels the azure mace Kyanos's icy destruction. The vessels shine, powered by people's good and evil deeds. The world is not black and white, but perhaps it can be red and blue.

103714010.baseEffect_: Randomly put 3 different Countdown amulets that cost 2 play points or less from your deck into play.
103714010.baseFlair_: Speaking a million prayers cost me my voice. So now I'll take up my pen and write a million more. —Preface to the Book of Prayer

101711080.baseFlair_: Commanded by a god to guard a sacred doorway, the giant has stood motionless for countless millennia.
101711080.evoFlair_: The guardian of the sacred doorway continues to stand in unflinching silence, stirring only to swat away an occasional intruder.

106731020.baseEffect_:

106731020.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Follower Strike: Deal X damage to the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return. X equals this follower's attack.

109741030.baseFlair_: Revered by humanity, he hunted down angels of corruption, tearing apart their wings and branding them. The gods recognized his deeds, but did not forgive him. He acknowledged the gods, but did not forgive them.
